package tweeter;

Class Tweeter


  • The core object for Tweeter library. Provides some simple helper methods that return primitive types and Strings, as well as exposing (through the 'twitter4j' instance variable) the full Twitter4j library.


    NOTE: When fetching tweets for a user or a keyword, the default request will return a maximum of 100 items. To get more results, you can supply a higher number as an additional argument. Passing -1 for this argument will cause the function to try to fetch ALL items. However, be warned that a separate request is issued for every 100 items, so, if you are using the rate-limited API, this may quickly exhaust your supply of queries.


    Functions starting with an underscore (e.g., myTweeter._search()) are considered 'advanced' as they either accept or return Twitter4j types, which require the addition of another import statement to your sketch, e.g.,: 

      import twitter4j.*;

      Tweeter(String ckey, String csec, String atok, String asec)

      Create a Tweeter object with your Twitter authentication keys (obtained from http://dev.twitter.com)

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long id()
      Returns the user-id for this user (that is, the user associated with the set of keys used to create the object)

      Posts the specified 'tweet' to Twitter

      Returns the number of tweets returned from the last search

      Returns the Creation-Date the tweet at the specified index following a search request

      Returns the User-Name associated with the tweet at the specified index following a search request

      Returns the Text of the tweet at the specified index following a search request

        public Tweeter(String ckey,
       String csec,
       String atok,
       String asec)
        Create a Tweeter object with your Twitter authentication keys (obtained from http://dev.twitter.com)
        Parameters:
        ckey - Twitter consumer key
        csec - Twitter consumer secret
        atok - Twitter access token
        asec - Twitter access token secret
